email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000 MT, and we are offering a lumpsum freight rate of USD 450,000 under CIF terms. The vessel, MV PACIFIC HORIZON, has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. Laycan is 20-25 October.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The lumpsum rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider reducing it to USD 420,000? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and provide more details on the vessel's loading speed?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your response. We can adjust the lumpsum rate to USD 430,000. The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, pro rata. The vessel's loading speed is 10,000 MT per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

USD 430,000 and the demurrage rate of USD 8,000 per day are acceptable. Can you confirm the laycan of 20-25 October and provide the charter party for review?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Laycan Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The laycan of 20-25 October is confirmed. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Charter Party Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed with the booking as discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
